content:
SecurityMasks Enum

Definition

Specifies the available options for examining security information of a directory object. This enumeration is used with the stem.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.SecurityMasks* and stem.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntryConfiguration.SecurityMasks* properties.

In this Article

[System.Flags]
public enum SecurityMasks
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
SecurityMasks

Examples

using System.DirectoryServices;  
...  
DirectorySearcher src = new DirectorySearcher("…");  
src.PropertiesToLoad = new string[] {ntSecurityDescriptor,…};  
src.SecurityMasks = SecurityMasks.Dacl | SecurityMasks.Owner;  
SearchResultCollection res = src.FindAll();

Fields

Dacl

Reads or writes the discretionary access-control list (DACL) data.
Group

Reads or writes the group data.
None

Does not read or write security data.
Owner

Reads or writes the owner data.
Sacl

Reads or writes the system access-control list (SACL) data.
